Instruction: Flatten chicken breasts to an even thickness by pressing with the palm of your hand.
Dip each chicken breast into beaten egg, then coat in bread crumbs by pressing down firmly.
Brown coated chicken breasts in the heated skillet with butter over medium heat until both sides are golden brown, approximately 5 minutes per side.

Add pasta sauce over chicken, cover, and allow the sauce to come to a boil. Lower the heat to simmer for 10 minutes. Sprinkle mozzarella cheese, Parmesan cheese, and parsley over the chicken. Cover and let simmer until the cheeses melt, approximately 5 more minutes.
The nutritional information provided accounts for the entire quantity of the breadcrumb ingredients. Actual consumption amounts may vary.
